Changelog
=========

1.2.0
-----
 - removed support for Python < 3.7

1.1.2
-----
 - updated Gitlab-CI configuration
 - removed Travis-CI configuration

1.1.1
-----
 - update plugin name and translation

1.1.0
-----
 - use security manager to authenticate credentials

1.0.1
-----
 - updated doctests

1.0.0
-----
 - initial release
